Quickstride perks up his ears with a sheepish grin on his face, looking inn=
ocently forgetful about not going back to the meeting.

"Oops!  I knew I wa=
s forgetting something, sorry Sir, bad short term memory, won't happen agai=
n I promise.  Right, back to the meeting, I'll be right there in no time fl=
at.  Hold on Windlord, gonna have ta haul hooves back to the meeting room. =
"

Quickstride quickly canters back to the Ark to return to the meeting, ru=
nning into Uproar as he too, bounds back into the Ark.

" I had a feeling t=
he meeting wasn't over yet.  At least I can say that Tucson sent me ta do a=
 favor for him."

Quickstride nods.

" So did I but I took a little more ti=
me than allowed."

It doesn't take them long to return to the meeting room.=
 

Meanwhile, Tucson receives the message and replies as he still holds Tal=
on gently in his arms.  He too is caught slightly off guard.

" Leo Prime, =
yes sorry I thought everyone could use some time out and I lost track of ti=
me..  Also, had a little processor disturbance, and I needed a little time =
to reboot.  I'm fine now, I'll be there with Talon shortly.  Sorry Talon, L=
eo Prime is right, we need to go back."  

Meanwhile, Straight Shot gets th=
e message to return to the meeting and steps out, clearing a tear from her =
optics as she nearly gets grazed by Rodimus.

" Ohh, sorry!"

Perpetually o=
n the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 11, 2011, at 7:28 AM, Super Cyclon=
us <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> As Quickstride and Windlord move aro=
und outside LORD ELDER came over
> to thier location, his alt mode that of =
a large dog with brown and
> black spots. However now there was metallic ar=
mor as well, he was
> transmtealled. In this mode he moved easily over the =
rough terrain to
> follow the two Maximals.
> 
> As he arrived at thier loc=
ation he transfomred to robot mode.
> "Quickstride, you do realize that the=
 meeting never ended, but you
> just walked out of it?" LORDE ELDER looked =
at QUICKSTRIDE and then at
> WINDLORD, "Weren't we suppose to be retrieving=
 Windlord and coming
> back?"
> 
> -------------------------------
> 
> The=
re is a beep on TUSCON's comm center in his quarters. "Tuscon
> Prime." It =
is LEO PRIME's voice. "The meeting had not ended, why did
> you send your t=
eams out and you retire to your quarters. Is there
> something going on tha=
t we all need to be aware of? And where is the
> rest of your team?" There =
is a note of concern in his voice as well as
> agitation.
> 
> ------------=
-------------------
> 
> RODIMUS PRIME drove through the different halls of=
 the ARK, using the
> its sensors as well as his own to locate the wayward =
WHEELIE,
> "WHEELIE! Where are you?" He called out as he zoomed in what he
=
> thought was his locatioons. "Wheelie!" He called again.
> 
> ------------=
-------------------
> 
> In the room where the meeting was still suppose to=
 be taking place LEO
> PRIME was still looking at the the bot with the pred=
acon signature,
> still waiting for an answer to his last question.
> 
> (T=
AG)
> 
> Preston
>

<p>As Quickstride and Windlord move around outside LORD ELDER came over<br>=

to thier location, his alt mode that of a large dog with brown and<br>
bla=
ck spots. However now there was metallic armor as well, he was<br>
transmte=
alled. In this mode he moved easily over the rough terrain to<br>
follow th=
e two Maximals.<br>
<br>
As he arrived at thier location he transfomred to =
robot mode.<br>
"Quickstride, you do realize that the meeting never ended, =
but you<br>
just walked out of it?" LORDE ELDER looked at QUICKSTRIDE and t=
hen at<br>
WINDLORD, "Weren't we suppose to be retrieving Windlord and comi=
ng<br>
back?"<br>
<br>
-------------------------------<br>
<br>
There is a =
beep on TUSCON's comm center in his quarters. "Tuscon<br>
Prime." It is LEO=
 PRIME's voice. "The meeting had not ended, why did<br>
you send your teams=
 out and you retire to your quarters. Is there<br>
something going on that =
we all need to be aware of? And where is the<br>
rest of your team?" There =
is a note of concern in his voice as well as<br>
agitation.<br>
<br>
------=
-------------------------<br>
<br>
RODIMUS PRIME drove through the differen=
t halls of the ARK, using the<br>
its sensors as well as his own to locate =
the wayward WHEELIE,<br>
"WHEELIE! Where are you?" He called out as he zoom=
ed in what he<br>
thought was his locatioons. "Wheelie!" He called again.<b=
r>
<br>
-------------------------------<br>
<br>
In the room where the meet=
ing was still suppose to be taking place LEO<br>
PRIME was still looking at=
 the the bot with the predacon signature,<br>
still waiting for an answer t=
o his last question.<br>
